title: Twilight Audio Book
description:
********Everyone who has downloaded this already and is about to********
I found a slight error that is perfectly fixable on iTunes

Look at the end of this summary i will tell you about the problem....

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

I spent two whole days taking the terrible old version of this download and 
separated them all into chapters. 

Then i decided to separate the chapters into 3 to 8 minute tracks for easier listening. 

I hope everyone enjoys this torrent. 
I sure do. 

I will eventually get then next four books up there.


Please seed....

Stephanie Meyer, Twilight, Audio Book

160 KPBS

Perfectly organized and named.

Great Quality

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

As for the error ... here it is

On the last part of chapter 16 (Carlisle) it starts into chapter 17 for about a minute, and then the next track starts at chapter 17 again, so it repeats about a minute.
Here is how to fix it

Right click the track--get info---options---end time needs to be changed to ...
... 03:44----(Just copy that right there and paste it into the slot)----after that just right click it again and create a new mp3 version of it and when it is done delete the old one. there ya go, sorry about that friends. The 48 KBPS version will not have that error. And it is too late to change it now on this one, and i am too lazy to make a new torrent, seriously it will take you about 5 minutes to fix it on your own.
